summary: Four men who were involved in the investigation of a German millionaire at the end of World War II are found murdered with tiny dolls left next to their corpses.
cast: Patrick Wymark|Margaret Johnston|John Standing|Alexander Knox|Judy Huxtable|Don Borisenko|Thorley Walters|Robert Crewdson|Colin Gordon|Tim Barrett|Frank Forsyth|Olive Gregg|Harold Lang|Gina Gianelli|Peter Diamond|John Harvey|Greta Farrer|Juba Kennerley
